channel.title: Need help with EP on SoundCloud (SOLVED)
channel.description: I was trying to make an EP, and it said “something single release date”. I went and put the release date on both tracks in but it still didn’t let me make the EP for the same reason. Would appreciate any help with this.

item.title: Need help with EP on SoundCloud (SOLVED)
item.dc:creator: traverse
item.description:
I’m not actually making an EP yet though. I was going to, then decided not to. This was for later.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with EP on SoundCloud (SOLVED)
item.dc:creator: traverse
item.description:
It worked now. But when I did it, it said you need to put it a release date for EP’s, even though I already put in a date. I clicked on the date, and it worked. I Think Soundcloud makes you click create twice for some reason.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with EP on SoundCloud (SOLVED)
